title: My Pixel 4 Unlocked does not detect any SIM card, do you kow what I can do to fix this issue?
content:
I bought a pixel 4, I'm from Mexico and I'm using a Telcel sim card that is currently working but not on pixel 4.
I have made some instructions that I found in this community but it doesn't work:
*I have reseted  Settings->System->Advanced->Reset Options->Reset Wi-Fi, mobile & Bluetooth
*II have made factory reset Settings->System->Advanced->Reset Options->Erase all data
*I changed the preferred network type using the option *#*#4636#*#* on phone information
    --I test all the available options (Initially it have selected "unknown")
*I tried to update the system and security update but just is a loading animation appear hours and do nothing.
